ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Quest problem
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You get matted halfling hides from the new halflings that they added after the patch, by the newbie log in Nek forest...  you just need to go west of the
ygData.messageBody:
--- xirendthon <xirendthon@...> wrote:
> One of the componets for my quest is Halfling Hides. Does
> anyone
> know where I can find these? Thank you in advance.
>


You get matted halfling hides from the new halflings that
they added after the patch, by the newbie log in Nek
forest... you just need to go west of the newbie log and
you will find them, becareful there are druids :p
I would suggest waiting for the wanders to go by,
depending on your level


=====
Steve
aka Dr. Scurrilous PhD.

"The Church says the Earth is flat. But I know that it is Round, For I have seen the Shadow on the moon. And I have more faith in a shadow than in the church"
--Magellan--
